name: polemicist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who strongly attacks or defends a particular opinion, person, idea, or set of beliefs: She has a reputation for being a brilliant polemicist. He became a celebrated polemist for classical architecture.
More examplesFewer examplesThey accused her of being a polemicist who never gave her victims the chance to reply to her attacks.The rumour was started by Protestant polemicists who wanted to limit the power of the Pope.He comes across as a polemicist rather than a teacher.
